name: Mutiny on the Ernest King
description:
Note: this game is mostly about the story that you learn from reading dialog. I didn't get the quest display going before I ran out of time, so it's you're not sure what to do, walk around and talk to people.

This is my entry in the raylib 5K game jam. It didn't quite get done so you'll notice the ship you are on is pretty sparse. But it was a ton of fun and maybe a sequel will come out some day.

Graphics are either drawn using raylib drawing commands or created using GIMP.

Music was made in beepbox and then converted with ffmpeg.

Sound effects were created with rFXGen by raylib
